item.title: physics760
item.description: Computational Physics (T) - physics760 Course Computational Physics (T) Course No. physics760 Category Type Language Teaching hours CP Semester Elective Lecture with exercises and project work English 2+2+1 7 WT/ST Requirements for Participation: Knowledge of a modern programming language (like C, C++) Preparation: Theoretical courses at the Bachelor degree level Form of Testing and Examination: successful participation in exercises,
